text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
El Condor Pasa enters the ring of the<n>Twinkle
Series. Her goal? To be the<n>strongest racer in the
world!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Surrounded by strong friends like<n>Special Week
and Grass Wonder, she<n>works hard towards her
goal...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
All so that she may one day take off for<n>races
across the world. With a vigorous<n>shout, El
Condor Pasa prepares to make<n>her dreams come
true.
